pages.text: $(1)My engineering-oriented friends have been increasingly curious of the Crucible's response to $(4)Redstone Signalling$(1). So, let us investigate.$(p)There are two avenues to explore: $(item)Input$(1) and $(item)Output$(1). Output seems simple enough; a $(item)Comparator$(1) reacts to the Crucible. While the ignal increases with Power level, I can't help but think $(4)other factors might also have an influence$(1).

$(item)Input$(1) is somewhat more interesting. I believe that a strong enough Redstone signal $(4)might affect the wards of the Crucible in some way$(1). $(0)$(o)Consider how $(item)Pistons$(0) are powered as an example.
